Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Padishehdedyt born of Shemer(?) with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an incised hoe, an adze and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of incised hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
